details.new_behavior: level: "info" | "warn" | "error" (only these three values allowed, default "info")
details.fix_summary: Updated type annotation to reflect actual type constraint and corrected default value from "debug" to "info"
Corrected default value from false to true to match actual implementation

details.old_behavior: No output examples shown; implicit assumption that logger.log() outputs plain text
details.new_behavior: log() method outputs JSON formatted string when json: true (default), or formatted string when json: false
details.fix_summary: Added output examples demonstrating both JSON and plain text formatting based on options

details.old_behavior: No documentation of return value structure
details.new_behavior: Returns object with log(message: string) method
details.fix_summary: Added Return Value section documenting the method signature
